programme.title: FIFA Club World Cup 2025 - Chasing The Trophy: Chelsea

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: Mike Greenberg, who joined ESPN in 1996 as an anchor, joins former NBA star Jalen Rose for roundtable discussions about the latest sports news making headlines as well as analysis of recent big games and interviews with expert commentators.

programme.title: NFL2Night

programme.desc: Bowlers compete for a $100,000 top prize in the final; Marshall Kent of Clarkston, Mich. won his seventh career PBA Tour title and maiden major championship crown with his 205-201 victory over Anthony Simonsen in last year's edition.
